verses.verse: Then <S%H935>came<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H6153>even<s%> the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> into the <S%H4057>desert<s%> of <S%H6790>Zin<s%> in the <S%H7223>first<s%> <S%H2320>month:<s%> and the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H3427>stayed<s%> in <S%H6946>Kadesh;<s%> and <S%H4813>Miriam<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there,<s%> and was <S%H6912>buried<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And there was <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4325>water<s%> for the <S%H5712>congregation:<s%> and they <S%H6950>gathered<s%> themselves together <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H5921>against<s%> <S%H175>Aaron.<s%>

And the <S%H5971>people<s%> <S%H7378>strived<s%> with <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> and <S%H559>spoke,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H3863>Would<s%> God that we had <S%H1478>died<s%> when our <S%H251>brothers<s%> <S%H1478>died<s%> <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD!<s%>

And <S%H4100>why<s%> have you <S%H935>brought<s%> up the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H4057>wilderness,<s%> that we and our <S%H1165>cattle<s%> should <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>there?<s%>

And <S%H4100>why<s%> have you made us to <S%H5927>come<s%> up out of <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> to <S%H935>bring<s%> us in to <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H7451>evil<s%> <S%H4725>place?<s%> it is <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H4725>place<s%> of <S%H2233>seed,<s%> or of <S%H8384>figs,<s%> or of <S%H1612>vines,<s%> or of <S%H7416>pomegranates;<s%> <S%H369>neither<s%> is there any <S%H4325>water<s%> to <S%H8354>drink.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H935>went<s%> from the <S%H6440>presence<s%> of the <S%H6951>assembly<s%> to the <S%H6607>door<s%> of the <S%H168>tabernacle<s%> of the <S%H4150>congregation,<s%> and they <S%H5307>fell<s%> on their <S%H6440>faces:<s%> and the <S%H3519>glory<s%> of the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H7200>appeared<s%> to them.
And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H1696>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H3947>Take<s%> the <S%H4294>rod,<s%> and <S%H6950>gather<s%> you the <S%H5712>assembly<s%> together, you, and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> your <S%H251>brother,<s%> and <S%H1696>speak<s%> you to the <S%H5553>rock<s%> before their <S%H5869>eyes;<s%> and it shall <S%H5414>give<s%> forth his <S%H4325>water,<s%> and you shall <S%H3318>bring<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> to them <S%H4325>water<s%> out of the <S%H5553>rock:<s%> so you shall give the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> and their <S%H1165>beasts<s%> <S%H8248>drink.<s%>
And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H3947>took<s%> the <S%H4294>rod<s%> from <S%H6440>before<s%> the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> as he <S%H6680>commanded<s%> him.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H6950>gathered<s%> the <S%H6951>congregation<s%> together <S%H413>before<s%> <S%H6440><s%> the <S%H5553>rock,<s%> and he <S%H559>said<s%> to them, <S%H8085>Hear<s%> <S%H4994>now,<s%> you <S%H4784>rebels;<s%> must we <S%H3318>fetch<s%> you <S%H4325>water<s%> out of <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H5553>rock?<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7311>lifted<s%> up his <S%H3027>hand,<s%> and with his <S%H4294>rod<s%> he <S%H5221>smote<s%> the <S%H5553>rock<s%> <S%H6471>twice:<s%> and the <S%H4325>water<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H7227>abundantly,<s%> and the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> drank, and their <S%H1165>beasts<s%> also.

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron,<s%> <S%H3282>Because<s%> you <S%H539>believed<s%> me not, to <S%H6942>sanctify<s%> me in the <S%H5869>eyes<s%> of the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H3651>therefore<s%> you shall not <S%H935>bring<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H6951>congregation<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> them.

<S%H1992>This<s%> is the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah;<s%> <S%H834>because<s%> the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H7378>strove<s%> with the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> and he was <S%H6942>sanctified<s%> in them.

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H7971>sent<s%> <S%H4397>messengers<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh<s%> to the <S%H4428>king<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H3541>Thus<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> your <S%H251>brother<s%> <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> You <S%H3045>know<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H8513>travail<s%> that has <S%H4672>befallen<s%> us:

How our <S%H1>fathers<s%> <S%H3381>went<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> into <S%H4714>Egypt,<s%> and we have <S%H3427>dwelled<s%> in <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> a <S%H7227>long<s%> <S%H3117>time;<s%> and the <S%H4714>Egyptians<s%> <S%H7489>vexed<s%> us, and our <S%H1>fathers:<s%>

And when we <S%H6817>cried<s%> to the <S%H3068>LORD,<s%> he <S%H8085>heard<s%> our <S%H6963>voice,<s%> and <S%H7971>sent<s%> an <S%H4397>angel,<s%> and has <S%H3318>brought<s%> us <S%H3318>forth<s%> out of <S%H4714>Egypt:<s%> and, <S%H2009>behold,<s%> we are in <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> a <S%H5892>city<s%> in the <S%H7097>uttermost<s%> of your <S%H1366>border:<s%>

Let us <S%H5674>pass,<s%> I <S%H4994>pray<s%> you, through your <S%H776>country:<s%> we will not <S%H5674>pass<s%> through the <S%H7704>fields,<s%> or through the <S%H3754>vineyards,<s%> <S%H3808>neither<s%> will we <S%H8354>drink<s%> of the <S%H4325>water<s%> of the <S%H875>wells:<s%> we will <S%H3212>go<s%> by the <S%H4428>king's<s%> high <S%H1870>way,<s%> we will not <S%H5186>turn<s%> to the <S%H3225>right<s%> <S%H3225>hand<s%> nor to the <S%H8040>left,<s%> <S%H5704>until<s%> we have <S%H5674>passed<s%> your <S%H1366>borders.<s%>
And <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, You shall not <S%H5674>pass<s%> by me, lest I <S%H3318>come<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> you with the <S%H2719>sword.<s%>

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H559>said<s%> to him, We will <S%H5927>go<s%> by the <S%H4546>high<s%> way: and <S%H518>if<s%> I and my <S%H4735>cattle<s%> <S%H8354>drink<s%> of your <S%H4325>water,<s%> then I will <S%H5414>pay<s%> <S%H4377><s%> for it: I will <S%H7535>only,<s%> <S%H369>without<s%> doing <S%H1697>anything<s%> else, <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>through<s%> <S%H5921>on<s%> my <S%H7272>feet.<s%>

And he <S%H559>said,<s%> You shall not <S%H5674>go<s%> <S%H5674>through.<s%> And <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H3318>came<s%> out <S%H7125>against<s%> him with <S%H3515>much<s%> <S%H5971>people,<s%> and with a <S%H2389>strong<s%> <S%H3027>hand.<s%>
Thus <S%H123>Edom<s%> <S%H3985>refused<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5674>passage<s%> through his <S%H1366>border:<s%> why <S%H3478>Israel<s%> <S%H5186>turned<s%> away from him.

And the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> even the <S%H3605>whole<s%> <S%H5712>congregation,<s%> <S%H5265>journeyed<s%> from <S%H6946>Kadesh,<s%> and <S%H935>came<s%> to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor.<s%>

And the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H559>spoke<s%> to <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> in <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor,<s%> by the <S%H1366>coast<s%> of the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H123>Edom,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%>

<S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people:<s%> for he shall not <S%H935>enter<s%> <S%H413>into<s%> the <S%H776>land<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> to the <S%H1121>children<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel,<s%> <S%H5921>because<s%> <S%H834><s%> you <S%H4784>rebelled<s%> <S%H4775>against<s%> my <S%H6310>word<s%> at the <S%H4325>water<s%> of <S%H4809>Meribah.<s%>
<S%H3947>Take<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son,<s%> and <S%H5927>bring<s%> them up to <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor:<s%>

And <S%H6584>strip<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son:<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> shall be <S%H622>gathered<s%> to his <S%H5971>people,<s%> and shall <S%H4191>die<s%> <S%H8033>there.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6213>did<s%> as the <S%H3068>LORD<s%> <S%H6680>commanded:<s%> and they <S%H5927>went<s%> up <S%H413>into<s%> <S%H2022>mount<s%> <S%H2023>Hor<s%> in the <S%H5869>sight<s%> of <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation.<s%>

And <S%H4872>Moses<s%> <S%H6584>stripped<s%> <S%H175>Aaron<s%> of his <S%H899>garments,<s%> and <S%H3847>put<s%> them on <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> his <S%H1121>son;<s%> and <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H4191>died<s%> <S%H8033>there<s%> in the <S%H7218>top<s%> of the <S%H2022>mount:<s%> and <S%H4872>Moses<s%> and <S%H499>Eleazar<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> from the <S%H2022>mount.<s%>

And when <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H5712>congregation<s%> <S%H7200>saw<s%> that <S%H175>Aaron<s%> was <S%H1478>dead,<s%> they <S%H1058>mourned<s%> for <S%H175>Aaron<s%> <S%H7970>thirty<s%> <S%H3117>days,<s%> even <S%H3605>all<s%> the <S%H1004>house<s%> of <S%H3478>Israel.<s%>
